text: The Lord1:2 The word translated “Lord” is “Adonai.” gave Jehoiakim king of Judah into his hand, with some of the vessels of the house of God;1:2 The Hebrew word rendered “God” is “אֱלֹהִ֑ים” (Elohim). and he carried them into the land of Shinar to the house of his god. He brought the vessels into the treasure house of his god.
